required_outline.I. Executive Summary: One- to three-page description of the project

II. Initiating.A. Statement of the problem: Clear description of the problem being addressed
II. Initiating.B. Project scope: Brief description of the project (purpose, rationale and expected benefits)

III. Planning and Organizing.B. Human resource management plan: Team member roles, skills and strengths and responsibilities

C. Schedule.i. Milestone: Describe the 2-4 major milestones (activities) needed to accomplish

III. Planning and Organizing.E. Risk management plan: Potential issues, potential impact of the issue and response strategy
III. Planning and Organizing.F. Proposed project budget: Include both monetary and in-kind donations when applicable

required_outline.IV. Execution: Description and documentation of the project plan implementation

V. Monitoring and Controlling.A. Monitoring: Describe how you monitored your schedule, budget and project quality
V. Monitoring and Controlling.B. Controlling: List issues encountered and how you dealt with them

VI. Closing the Project.B. Lessons learned: Describe what worked well and what didn't work well for each of the project management processes: initiating, planning and organizing, execution, monitoring and controlling

required_outline.VII. Bibliography: A bibliography is required. Include a list of the sources of information used in the written document.
required_outline.VIII. Appendix: An appendix is optional. If additional material is appended, all pages must be numbered. Include exhibits appropriate to the written entry but not important enough to include in the body (e.g. sample questionnaires, letters, background data, minutes of meetings).

sections.name: Executive Summary
sections.description: One- to three-page description of the project

sections.name: Initiating
sections.description: Statement of the problem and project scope

sections.name: Planning and Organizing
sections.description: Project goals, human resource management plan, schedule, quality management plan, risk management plan, proposed project budget

sections.name: Execution
sections.description: Description and documentation of the project plan implementation

sections.name: Monitoring and Controlling
sections.description: Monitoring schedule, budget and project quality; issues and how you dealt with them

sections.name: Closing the Project
sections.description: Evaluation of key metrics, lessons learned, recommendations for future projects

sections.name: Appearance and Word Usage
sections.description: Professional layout, neatness, proper grammar, spelling and word usage
